description:
The magic of Capilene is its ability to wick moisture and dry fast. With a smooth outer surface, the double-knit fabric of the Midweight Zip Neck slides under your top layers. A brushed-grid pattern on the back holds warmth near your skin. Not too heavy, not too light, the midweight option takes you from alpine snowfields to early-season campsites.

  • Made of diamond grid recycled polyester double-knit thermal fabric
  • HeiQ® Fresh durable odour treatment fights stink
  • Deep zip offers good venting potential
  • Hidden elastic thumb loops
  • Raglan shoulder seams and underarm gussets promote good range of motion
name: Patagonia Capilene Midweight Zip Neck - Women's
